author: Ellie Harrison, Ellie Harrison
title: Trevor Noah calls out Trump for 'insane' and 'vile' guidelines for ending US lockdown
content:
Trevor Noah has condemned Donald Trump once again on The Daily Social Distancing Show, calling the presidents guidelines for ending US lockdown insane and vile.
Last week, Trump announced that three states led by Democratic governors should be liberated from… [+1744 chars]
